snippet: Shuler Hensley stars in “Dr. Seuss’ How the Grinch Stole Christmas! The Musical,” the holiday offering at the Theater at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: Laura Collins-Hughes reviews Dr Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas! The Musical, adapted from books by Dr Seuss and related 1966 animated television special, with book and additional music and lyrics by Mel Marvin and Timothy Mason; production, at Madison Square Garden, stars Shuler Hensley.
lead_paragraph: Shuler Hensley stars in “Dr. Seuss’ How the Grinch Stole Christmas! The Musical,” the holiday offering at the Theater at Madison Square Garden.
